author: Eckhart Tolle
statement: You are not your mind. You are the consciousness that is aware of the mind.

author: Don Miguel Ruiz
statement: The past is gone, and the future is not yet here. Only the present moment matters.

author: Byron Katie
statement: It's not the thoughts that bother you, but your attachment to them.

author: Deepak Chopra
statement: The true nature of reality is that it is infinitely flexible and malleable.

author: Louise Hay
statement: I am willing to release the patterns that created this condition.

author: Wayne Dyer
statement: You are not a victim of your past. You are a product of your choices.

author: Pema Chödrön
statement: You are the sky. Everything else is just the weather.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
statement: The past is gone, the future is not yet here. We have only one moment, the present moment.

author: Gabby Bernstein
statement: When you choose love over fear, you change the energy of your entire experience.

author: Tony Robbins
statement: Your past does not equal your future.

author: Brené Brown
statement: Who we are is how we live and love, not our past mistakes.

author: Tara Brach
statement: The wound is the place where the light enters you.

author: Jon Kabat-Zinn
statement: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.

author: Oprah Winfrey
statement: Every day is a chance to begin again.

author: James Clear
statement: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.

author: Stephen Covey
statement: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response.

author: Elizabeth Gilbert
statement: You are not obligated to be the person you were five minutes ago.

author: Ram Dass
statement: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.

author: Paulo Coelho
statement: Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself.

author: Marie Forleo
statement: Everything is figureoutable.

author: Sharon Salzberg
statement: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.

author: Jack Canfield
statement: Everything you want is on the other side of fear.

author: Esther Hicks (Abraham)
statement: You are only ever one thought away from a different feeling.

author: Gabriele Oettingen
statement: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: RuPaul
statement: If you can't love yourself, how in the hell are you gonna love somebody else?
